eng: In fine clay bricks , craftsmen would carve images of objects or patterns . The beauty of brick carving in traditional Taiwanese architecture can be enjoyed along the old streets of Sanhsia and Shenkeng , in the Lin Family Compound of Panchiao , and in the old residences of Yuanli in Miaoli . Carved bricks are in the gatehouses , the lintels , the roofs , and even the furniture , brush holders and fruit platters .
